evidence.claim: The company employs FHIR standards for data interoperability in healthcare.
Senior Home Health is HIPAA compliant, ensuring secure handling of patient information.
Integration with EHR systems is part of their service offerings, facilitating data sharing with providers.
They utilize HL7 messaging standards to communicate patient data effectively across platforms.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 use cases or API automation found on their site.
